title: Dorset & Hampshire live: Tuesday 20 September - BBC News
summary: despite delays , ambulance service rated `` good '' .
cherries prepare for preston in efl cup .
hampshire cricket fighting for top flight survival .

documents.title: that 's all for today
text: we 'll be back on wednesday from 08:00 .

documents.title: more congestion in portsmouth
text: gladys avenue in portsmouth is now blocked in both directions at the london avenue junction , because of an accident involving two vehicles .
take it easy out there people .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: fire in living room
text: firefighters have put out a blaze in the living room of a ground floor flat in weymouth .
crews were called to the flat in canberra crescent just before 15:00 .
14:51 @ twitterid crews extinguished a fire in a flat lounge in canberra crescent -

documents.title: travel : broken down lorry on a303
text: there 's slow traffic and one lane blocked on the a303 westbound in andover at the a3093 junction , because of a broken down lorry .
for the latest , visit the bbc travel pages .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: travel : crash in fareham
text: highlands road in fareham is blocked and there 's queuing traffic in both directions at the blackbrook road junction , because of an accident involving a car and a motorcycle .
police are directing traffic .
for the latest , visit the bbc travel pages .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: school applications site opens
text: applications are now open for secondary school places in hampshire .
parents of children in year 6 in primary or junior school have until 31 october to apply .

documents.title: hampshire scheme supports rio medalwinners
text: hampshire 's culture and recreation councillor has said the county is proud of its nine athletes who won a total of 12 medals at rio in the olympic and paralym
andrew gibson said hampshire county council had played a role in the success of five athletes who were supported by the hampshire talented athlete scheme .

alex danson from odiham won gold with the olym hockey team , sprinter george hermitage from alton won paralympic gold and two silvers , new milton swimmer alice tai ( home paralympic gold and bronze , mike jones from new milton also won paralympic swimming gold and david smith from eastleigh won paralympic gold in boccia .

we 'll continue to nurture the grass roots and support the county 's talented athletes , not only producing future olympic and paralympic champions but exciting thousands of youngsters to lead healthier , more active lives .

documents.title: crash death woman named
text: police have named a woman who died in a crash on the a3 on thursday .
laura westbrook , 22 , from waterlooville , died when the car she was in left the road near clanfield .
in a tribute , laura 's mother , justine westbrook , said : `` sweet dreams , sleep tight , i love you , good night . ''

documents.title: arts trail at country park
text: a new arts trail is being created at pan country park on the isle of wight .
the pollen trail is funded by developer contributions which were part of the planning conditions for pan and bluebell meadows development .
the trail includes a series of carved wooden benches , which have already been installed and feature butterflies , dormice and the bullhead fish .
the bullhead fish can be found within the pan streams and only a few other locations on the isle of wight .
the benches were carved by local chainsaw artist paul sivell .

documents.title: man punched and kicked by robbers
text: police are appealing for information after a man in weymouth was punched and kicked by robbers who stole his wallet .
the 23-year-old victim was walking towards the station in turton street on friday at 23:00 when he was approached by three or four men and was punched to the ground .
he continued to be punched and kicked while on the floor and sustained injuries to his eye and ribs .

documents.title: travel : bridge maintenance closes road
text: the b3091 in sturminster newton is closed at the hosey bridge junction , because of bridge maintenance work .
for the latest , visit the bbc travel pages .

documents.title: south weather
text: south weather

documents.title: your waverley paddle steamer
text: thanks to ali who sent in this of the waverley paddle steamer sailing by netley castle .
the waverley was built in 1946 and is the last sea-going paddle steamer in the world .
you can send us your photos of the region via email , on our hampshire and dorset facebook pages or on twitter @ bbc hampshire and @ bbcdorset .

documents.title: studland beach huts to move
text: beach huts at studland considered at severe risk of suffering storm damage will be moved back from the sea .
the 42 huts at middle beach will be moved by the national trust over the autumn .
bournemouthecho
bournemouthecho
national trust to move 42 beach huts back from the sea bit.ly/2d1t8a7
national trust to move 42 beach huts back from the sea

documents.title: frolicking deer video goes viral
text: footage of a deer frolicking in poole harbour has gone viral .
the clip has had more than 12 million views since it was uploaded to the south today facebook page on monday lunchtime .
the deer was spotted at poole harbour by dave mott who was walking his dog along the shore at dawn .
it 's thought to be a japanese sika deer that may have swum over from brownsea island where there 's a resident population .

documents.title: travel : trinity street in dorchester closed
text: travel dorset
traveldorset
update : dorchester - trinity street closed due to a medical incident at high west street .
update : dorchester - trinity street closed due to a medical incident at high west street .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: medical incident : dorchester high street and trinity street closed
text: police and ambulance cars are blocking the high street in dorchester at the junction with trinity street while paramedics treat a patient on the tarmac .
trinity street is also closed between the high street and princes street .

documents.title: solent wheel to re-open after rescue
text: a ferris wheel temporarily closed after it stopped leaving two people stuck 25m ( 82ft ) in the air is expected to re-open on wednesday .
the solent wheel was shut down on monday after a 66-year-old grandmother and her six-year-old grandson had to be rescued by firefighters from a pod at the top of the ride .
clarence pier said a technical fault on the computer systems which caused the ride to shut down had been located .
hampshire fire and rescue service used an aerial ladder platform to rescue the pair from the ride at clarence pier amusement parade on southsea seafront in portsmouth .

documents.title: pedestrian killed on a303 near andover is named
text: an 18-year-old pedestrian who died after he was knocked down by a motorhome as he crossed the a303 near andover on friday evening has been named as harry butler from walled meadow in the town .

a 23-year old man from liss who was also struck by the fiat motorhome suffered serious injuries and was taken to southampton general hospital , where his condition is described as stable but life-threatening .
police appealed for any witnesses to the crash to come forward .

documents.title: container port adds more land
text: southampton 's container port has announced significant expansion plans .
the container port is adding 11 acres more land , more giant cranes and more container carriers to cope with a projected increase in trade .
by 2030 , the port is expected to be handling a minimum of 4.2 million containers units , 840,000 motor vehicles , over 2.1 million tonnes of dry bulks and almost two million cruise passengers .

documents.title: on board an £ 8.4m luxury yacht at southampton boat show
text: business presenter aaron heslehurst takes a tour of a princess m class vessel at the southampton boat show .
it costs £ 8.4m ( $ 11m ) , has 37 miles of cabling , and costs £ 38,000 ( $ 50,000 ) to fill with fuel .

documents.title: dorset cereals muesli recall
text: dorset cereals is recalling some of its cereals because they do not carry the correct allergy labelling .
the foods standards agency said the recall affected seven dorset cereal muesli products sold at fultons foods , based in south yorkshire .
the fsa said the cereals may pose a possible health risk for anyone with an allergy to nuts , wheat , barley , oats and /or intolerance to gluten and/or a sensitivity to sulphites .
dorset cereals said any customer who returns the product will be given a full refund .

documents.title: moving observatory art studio shortlisted for award
text: a mobile artist 's studio has been shortlisted for the stephen lawrence prize .
the observatory , a travelling art studio project by new forest-based spud charity , is among six projects on the shortlist for the best project with a construction budget of less than £ 1m .
the royal institute of british architects established the annual architectural award in memory of the aspiring architect who was murdered in 1993 .
the observatory
lookinlookout
looking forward to welcoming the stephen lawrence prize judges to the observatory at mottisfont this morning @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: hampshire v durham - live
text: get all the latest from the ageas bowl as hampshire host durham , with live text updates and commentary from bbc sport .

documents.title: island sailor in extreme sailing challenge
text: isle of wight sailor , tom buggy , will be racing in the sixth act of the 2016 extreme sailing series .
the fleet of hydro-foiling gc32s will race from 22 - 25 september off the madeira islands , portugal .
onthewight

text: @ willsmith 2 & @ twitterid open the batting for hampshire
good luck lads !

documents.title: more custody visitors needed in dorset
text: custody visitors - people who check on the welfare of detainees at police stations - are being recruited in dorset , as the police and crime commissioner asks for volunteers to come forward .
radio solent met salvatore d'arrigo , who explained what he does and the impact it can have .

documents.title: bournemouth v preston north end
text: bournemouth have a fully fit squad for their efl cup tie against preston tonight but manager eddie howe is expected to rotate his side .
striker callum wilson could return to the starting xi , while arsenal loanee jack wilshere is likely to feature .
kick-off is at 19.45 bst .

documents.title: robert white car auction raises £ 3.5m for dorset cancer patients
text: a collection of vintage and classic motorcycles and cars has raised more than £ 3.5m to help cancer patients .
the items , which also included watches and cameras , were owned by photographer and retailer robert white who died of cancer last year , aged 62 .
he was treated in dorset and proceeds from the auction will help fund new facilities in the county and support a number of staff training bursaries .
highlights from the sale at bonhams in london , which had more than 600 lots , included a 1930 bentley four-and-a-half litre le mans-style tourer which fetched £ 315,100 .

documents.title: buses to avoid southampton estate after 'incidents '
text: first southampton buses have announced due to recent `` incidents '' on the millbrook estate , buses wo n't go into the estate `` for the safety of our passengers and staff '' .. �
due to recent incidents with our buses , should we have any issues within millbrook estate , we will divert the cr2 & not enter .
apologies .
`` inconenveince '' ?
what about the 12 as that enters millbrook as well

documents.title: police seek witnesses to 'fail-to-stop ' crash
text: police in dorset are appealing for information after the driver of a car involved in a crash in sandford , poole failed to stop .
police said the driver of a silver vw passat failed to stop for officers as it travelled along the a351 between holton heath and the bakers arms roundabout on sunday .
the car later crashed into the fence in forest edge road , at about 21:00 bst .
the driver left the scene .
it 's believed the car may have been travelling with a black bmw car before the crash .
police want to hear from anyone who knows who was behind the wheel of either vehicle .
a 25-year-old man from poole arrested on sus of driving offences has been released on police bail .

documents.title: travel : a32 delays
text: travel : warnford to west meon , 25 min delay a32 northbound to a272 & west meon pub .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: ambulance service good despite delays
text: south central ambulance service has been rated good despite missing response targets , with praise from the government 's heath watchdog for outperforming targets for non-urgent calls .
the care quality commission said `` improvements are needed '' and it would continue monitoring the trust .
service chief executive will hancock said : `` this is fabulous news for our organisation as we are the first and only ambulance trust to get a good rating across ambulance trusts in england . ''
author: Alex Regan
South Online

documents.title: weather : becoming drier and brighter
text: it will be a mostly cloudy day , with patchy light rain and drizzle at times , although these will tend to ease by the afternoon .
it will become drier and brighter , with some sunny spells developing , which may trigger the odd sharp shower in places .
maximum temperature : 18c ( 64f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: cruise ship koningsdam arrives in portland
text: a 2,650 passenger cruise ship has dropped anchor for the first time in portland port .
at 297m in length koningsdam is believed to be the longest cruise ship to berth at the port .
the ship is expected to sail at 19:00 bst .

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to local live for dorset , hampshire and the isle of wight on tuesday .
we 'll be bringing you the latest news from across the three counties .
you can get in touch by email , on our hampshire and dorset facebook pages or on twitter @ bbc hampshire and @ bbcdorset .
